Accelerate your career with expertise in Data Analysis and Reporting with

By the end of this 1-week course, you will understand how to leverage R and RStudio Desktop to accelerate in your data journey, save time and open doors to new opportunities.

Why R?

R is a powerful programming language commonly used for statistical computing and data analysis. It has a large and active community, which makes it easy to find help when you need it.

R has a simple and easy-to-learn syntax, making it a good choice for beginners. Additionally, R is open-source and free to use, which means you don’t need to spend money to learn it.

Learning R will also help you in data visualization, machine learning and statistical analysis which are useful skills in today’s data-driven world.

“R is not a language driven by the purity of its philosophy; R is a language designed to get shit done.” — @hadleywickham, rstudioconf2022.

R is also widely used in many industries, such as finance, healthcare, and technology, which means you will have many job opportunities once you learn it.

Enroll Now, limited seats only!

What will you get?

The course content has been specially curated by Vishal Katti, who is also the Instructor for this course. The course introduces the Programming Language and demonstrates why it is a game-changer for data analysts who want to elevate their data skills. The Instructor demonstrates some interesting data manipulation techniques and operations that will radicalize your way of thinking about data.

🎓 Expert-Curated Curriculum

Course Plan

Day 1

  • Introduction: Why should you learn R?
  • Best Practices and Customizing RStudio
  • Variables and Data Types in R
  • Basic Dataframe operations
  • Vectorization
  • Q&A

Day 2

  • Tidy Data Concept
  • Installing Packages and Best Practices
  • Importing data into R from CSV/Excel
  • tibble vs data.frame
  • Q&A

Day 3

  • Functions and Piping Functions
  • Data Manipulation
  • Best Practices
  • Q&A

Day 4

  • Visualizations
  • Notebooks
  • Q&A

Day 5

  • Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
  • LIVE DEMO: EDA for IPL Men’s Cricket Matches Data (2008-2023)
  • Q&A
  • Bonus Track

Terms and Conditions

  1. Deadline for Registration: The final date for registration for a batch is 2 days before the start of the batch

  2. Cancellation Policy: Should a registrant wish to cancel their registration; they may do so freely until the aforementioned deadline and get a FULL REFUND. Any cancellation requests received after this time will get PARTIAL REFUND of their Registration Fees minus a penalty of ₹ 500/- up until the commencement of the course. Once a batch starts, all registrations become final, and NO REFUND will be issued under any circumstances.

  3. Change of Batch: This is subject to availability of free slots in other scheduled batches.

  4. Punctuality and Attendance: Participants are expected to adhere to scheduled session times punctually, respecting the time commitments of all involved.

  5. Live Course Content: We encourage participants to engage actively during sessions, as the course is conducted live and does not offer recorded content for review.

  6. 1-on-1 Support: This will be available only for 7 days post batch completion, between 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM only.

  7. Certificate of Completion: Participants who attend all 5 days of a batch and submit the final assignment within 7 days of batch completion will be given a Certificate of Completion
